headline: Diamondback Energy, Inc. (FANG): One of the Best Energy Stocks to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best Energy Stocks To Invest In Now. In this article, we are going to look at where Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) stands against other best energy stocks to invest in now. The rise of generative AI and quantum computing has sparked a technological revolution, but behind this growth […]

headline: Here's Why Hold Strategy is Apt for ConocoPhillips Stock Now
summary: Favorable oil prices are aiding COP's bottom line. However, the stock is exposed to commodity price volatility.

headline: Down 9%, 11%, and 14% in 1 Month, These 3 Dividend Stocks Are Screaming Buys in December
summary: Lee Samaha (Diamondback Energy): It's been a challenging year for investors in Diamondback, with the stock underperforming the S&P 500, but it's been a good year for Diamondback operationally.  The price of oil is about $70 a barrel, similar to what it started the year at, and it spent most of the year above that price.  In addition, Diamondback completed a transformational $26 billion transaction with Endeavor resulting in a merger.
